readable.title: 621000329_84f48948eb
readable.content: A little girl smiles as she wears a white bowl on the top of her head . A smiling blonde girl with a red striped shirt is sitting in a chair at a table with a white porcelain bowl on her head . A smiling young girl sitting at a table has an upturned bowl on her head . A young girl in a striped shirt wears a bowl on her head . A young girl sitting at a table with a bowl on her head
